name: tailwind-css-tutorial-net-ninja
description: This is my Git repo for a [Tailwind CSS tutorial](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bxmDnn7lrnk&list=PL4cUxeGkcC9gpXORlEHjc5bgnIi5HEGhw) YouTube series by the net ninja.  I decided to undertake this as I want to use tailwind in some upcoming projects and thought  it would be a good idea to cover a tutorial series to learn this technology beforehand.
